item.title: common knowledge cheat sheet
item.description: Rust String.push(char) takes char Vec has reverse method where as iterator has rev method String and &str both have chars method that convert string to Char String and &str can be split_whitespace they also can call split(pat: P) e.g split(' ') is equivalent to split by whitespace NOTE: in rust usize -1 could overflow to max, this might causing algorithm not working properly Docker Docker can be run with --network=host on windows, but as stated by reference, quote: The host networking driver only works on Linux hosts, and is not supported on Docker Desktop for Mac, Docker Desktop for Windows, or Docker EE for Windows Server.
